job_details.degree_required: BS/MS in Electronics & Communications, Computer Engineering

jd: From: Sugam Saurav, Intellicept.inc ssaurav@intellicept.com Reply to: ssaurav@intellicept.com Hi,I hope you are doing wellPlease find the Jd mentioned below. Role Title: Telephony Project Manager No. of Positions: 1Hiring Mode: Contract (TP)Location: MountainView, CA [Onsite] Job description:BS/MS in Electronics & Communications, Computer EngineeringDay to day test team management, review of team output, make course correction whenever requiredCommunicate with various functional teams to manage test effortsPrepare reports, track KPI, maintain dashboards, and present to relevant stakeholders Identify risks and discuss risk management plan with project stakeholders5-8 years of project/program management experience2~5 years of experience in managing carrier certification such as PTCRB and GCF including scheduling, testing and execution;2~5 years of experience in modem/telephony technology stack and troubleshooting;5+ years familiarity with cellular radio technologies 2G/3G/4G LTE, VoLTE, 5G and their implementation in Mobile devices and cellular network operators (Carriers)Experience of working on network simulators from Anritsu/Keysight/R&SFamiliarity with Android and Linux
